meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed colicines to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effectiveness of different colicines.
meanings.sent3: The colicines marched into battle against the harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The colicines acted like tiny soldiers fighting off the invaders.
meanings.sent5: The colicines worked tirelessly to protect the body from harm.

meanings.definition: Colicines: a group of proteins that inhibit cell division
meanings.sent1: The colicines stopped the cells from dividing and spreading.
meanings.sent2: Cells rely on colicines to control their growth and reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous colicines played a prank on the dividing cells.
meanings.sent4: The colicines were like traffic lights halting the cell traffic.
meanings.sent5: The colicines were the silent regulators of cell division.

meanings.definition: Colicines: substances produced by bacteria to kill other bacteria
meanings.sent1: The colicines released by the bacteria destroyed their rivals.
meanings.sent2: Bacteria use colicines as weapons in their microscopic battles.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky colicines plotted to eliminate the competition.
meanings.sent4: The colicines were like secret agents targeting enemy bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The colicines were the lethal arsenal of the bacterial world.
